data.description: This project will investigate composition and functioning of the iconic spinifex grasslands of arid Australia. The findings will increase the capacity to restore these landscapes after mining. Project outcomes directly address the national priority for sustainable use of Australiaâ€™s biodiversity, particularly of vulnerable ecosystems.
data.scientific_title: Defining biologically significant units in spinifex (Triodia spp.) for improved ecological restoration in arid Australia

data.description: Using a combination of eco-physiological and geometric measures this project will evaluate the influence of leaf vein networks on leaf economics. It is expected that this work will identify vein investment and network design as major sources of variability underlying species adaptive strategies, and the global leaf economics spectrum as a whole.
data.scientific_title: Quantifying the contribution of leaf vein networks to the leaf economics spectrum in native and agricultural species
